Domain Age Checker: Instantly Reveal Website History

Curious about a website's credibility? Our extension unveils the age of any domain you visit with a single click. 

Key benefits:
• Assess website trustworthiness at a glance
• Identify potentially new or suspicious domains
• Make informed decisions about online interactions

Perfect for:
• Online shoppers verifying store legitimacy
• Researchers evaluating source reliability
• Anyone curious about a website's history

Powered by Semantic Pen's robust domain data, get accurate age information effortlessly. Enhance your browsing experience with this lightweight, user-friendly tool.

Install now to add an extra layer of insight to your web exploration!
